title: [Curlew Brook Bridge]
description: The turbulent water of a small creek chatters endlessly below this graceful span, creating tiny waterfalls and whirlpools as it makes its final descent towards the Mistydeep River.  From this vantage point, the dark forms of fish are barely visible, lurking in the shallows among the pale reeds growing along the banks.

The turbulent water of a small creek chatters endlessly below this graceful span, creating tiny waterfalls and whirlpools as it makes its final descent towards the Mistydeep River.  From this vantage point, a few colorful fish are visible lurking in the shallows among the pale green reeds growing along the banks.
